sect1.title: Relation Type Specific
sect1.para: Force-directed algorithm based on relation types. In the following example, we use AraCyc
We then focus on a particular pathway (by filtering using the Tag filter and selecting "GDP-L-fucose biosynthesis")
Finally, we apply the Relation Type Specific Layout. The length of a given relation is proportional to the number of relations of that relation type, for that concept.
